metadata.title: CVE-2022-1259 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in Undertow. A potential security issue in flow controlhandling by the browser over HTTP/2 may cause overhead or a denial ofservice in the server. This flaw exists because of an incomplete fix forCVE-2021-3629.

criterions.comment: undertow package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
